body.p: After considering the comments received on the exposure draft of 2002, the Board added to IAS 1 a requirement in paragraph 21 to disclose the effect of a departure from a requirement of an IFRS in a prior period on the current period’s financial statements. Without this disclosure, users of the entity’s financial statements could be unaware of the continuing effects of prior period departures.
